Data.Label: Dishwasher Ð Hot Flow

Data.Label: Water Temp - MixValve Hot In

Data.Label: Water Temp - SHW HX (80 gal) HX Out

Data.Label: Water Temp - HPWH Out

Data.Label: Glycol Temp - SHW HX (80 gal) HX Out

Data.Label: PV System 1 AC Energy OS;Ê E_AC_PV1_OS

Data.Label: PV System 2 AC Energy OS;Ê E_AC_PV2_OS
Description: Cumulative AC energy generation out of the inverter 2 of the photovoltaic array; data collected with current shunts.

Data.Label: PV Backside Temp 2
Description: Instantaneous temperature on the backside of module at location 2 of the photovoltaic array.  Location 2 is on the 3rd string from the bottom of the array, the fourth module from the west side of the array.

Data.Label: PV Backside Temp 3
Description: Instantaneous temperature on the backside of module at location 3 of the photovoltaic array.  Location 3 is on the 3rd string from the bottom of the array, the fourth module from the west side of the array.

Data.Label: PV Backside Temp 4
Description: Instantaneous temperature on the backside of module at location 4 of the photovoltaic array.  Location 4 is on the 3rd string from the bottom of the array, the fourth module from the west side of the array.

Data.Label: PV Backside Temp 7
Description: Instantaneous temperature on the backside of module at location 7 of the photovoltaic array.  Location 7 is on the top string of the array, the west-most module of the array.

Data.Label: String Voltage [U_Str2]
Description: Instantaneous voltage from String 2 of photovoltaic array into inverter 1 (DC)

Data.Label: String Voltage [U_Str4]
Description: Instantaneous voltage from String 4 of photovoltaic array into inverter 2 (DC)

Data.Label: Volts A-N [U_AN_1=]
Description: Instantaneous voltage difference between the Phase A live wire and neutral wire from inverter 1 (AC)

Data.Label: Volts B-N [U_BN_1]
Description: Instantaneous voltage difference between the Phase B live wire and neutral wire from inverter 1 (AC)

Data.Label: Amps A [I_A_1]
Description: Instantaneous current produced from the Phase A wire from inverter 1 (AC)

Data.Label: Amps B [I_B_1]
Description: Instantaneous current produced from the Phase B wire from inverter 1 (AC)

Data.Label: Watts, 3-Ph Total [W_3PhT_1]
Description: Instantaneous power produced from Inverter 1 (Single phase AC); meters utilize current transformers

Data.Label: Frequency [F_1]
Description: Instantaneous frequency of AC electricity output from inverter 1

Data.Label: W-hours, Delivered [Wh_D_1]
Description: Cumulative energy delivered by inverter 1 from beginning of operation as measured by system using current transformers

Data.Label: Volts A-N [U_AN_2=]
Description: Instantaneous voltage difference between the Phase A live wire and neutral wire from inverter 2 (AC)

Data.Label: Volts B-N [U_BN_2]
Description: Instantaneous voltage difference between the Phase B live wire and neutral wire from inverter 2 (AC)

Data.Label: Amps A [I_A_2]
Description: Instantaneous current produced from the Phase A wire from inverter 2 (AC)

Data.Label: Amps B [I_B_2]
Description: Instantaneous current produced from the Phase B wire from inverter 2 (AC)

Data.Label: Watts, 3-Ph Total [W_3PhT_2]
Description: Instantaneous power produced from Inverter 2 (Single phase AC); meters utilize current transformers

Data.Label: Frequency [F_2]
Description: Instantaneous frequency of AC electricity output from inverter 2

Data.Label: W-hours, Delivered [Wh_D_2]
Description: Cumulative energy delivered by inverter 2 from beginning of operation as measured by system using current transformers

Data.Label: String Current [I_Str1]
Description: Instantaneous direct current from string 1 feeding into inverter 1

Data.Label: String Current [I_Str2]
Description: Instantaneous direct current from string 2 feeding into inverter 1

Data.Label: String Current [I_Str3]
Description: Instantaneous direct current from string 3 feeding into inverter 2

Data.Label: String Current [I_Str4]
Description: Instantaneous direct current from string 4 feeding into inverter 2

Data.Label: PV System 1 AC Power OS; ÊP_AC_PV1_OS
Description: Instantaneous AC power reading from inverter 1 as measured by current shunts

Data.Label: PV System 2 AC Power OS; ÊP_AC_PV2_OS
Description: Instantaneous AC power reading from inverter 1 as measured by current shunts

Data.Label: PV Insolation (H_Array)
Description: The amount of sunlight impacting the array during the past minute.

Data.Label: Outdoor Amb. Temp
Description: Instantaneous dry bulb temperature measured on roof of house

Data.Label: Rooftop Wind Speed
Description: Instantaneous wind speed measured on roof of house

Data.Label: Rooftop Wind Direction
Description: Instantaneous wind direction measured on roof of house; 0¡ means wind is blowing from true north; all other readings are taken relative to clockwise from true north.  For example, 90¡ means wind is blowing from true east to true west.

Data.Label: HRV Temp - Supply Out
Description: Instantaneous dry bulb temperature in the supply duct outlet from the heat recovery ventilator; refers to outdoor air being brought into the house

Data.Label: HRV Temp - Return In
Description: Instantaneous dry bulb temperature in the return duct inlet to the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV Temp - Exhaust Out
Description: Instantaneous dry bulb temperature in the exhaust duct outlet from the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV Temp - Outdoor in
Description: Instantaneous dry bulb temperature in the outdoor inlet duct to the heat recovery ventilator; refers to outdoor air being brought into the house

Data.Label: HRV Dewpoint Temperature - Supply
Description: Instantaneous dew point temperature in the supply duct outlet from the heat recovery ventilator; refers to outdoor air being brought into the house

Data.Label: HRV Dewpoint Temperature - Return
Description: Instantaneous dew point temperature in the return duct inlet to the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV Dewpoint Temperature - Exhaust
Description: Instantaneous dew point temperature in the exhaust duct outlet from the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV Dewpoint Temperature - Outdoor
Description: Instantaneous dew point temperature in the outdoor inlet duct to the heat recovery ventilator; refers to outdoor air being brought into the house

Data.Label: HRV fresh air pressure differential
Description: Instantaneous pressure differential across heat recovery ventilator of the outdoor air stream

Data.Label: HRV stale air pressure differential
Description: Instantaneous pressure differential across heat recovery ventilator of the exhaust air stream

Data.Label: HRV return flow rate
Description: Instantaneous flow rate of air in the return flow duct entering the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV exhaust flow rate
Description: Instantaneous flow rate of air in the exhaust duct outlet from the heat recovery ventilator; refers to indoor air being exhausted from the house

Data.Label: HRV outdoor flow rate
Description: Instantaneous flow rate of air in the outdoor inlet duct to the heat recovery ventilator; refers to outdoor air being brought into the house
